DOC.brief_summary: Background : - Family twin study suggest genetic factor influence approximately 50 percent person 's susceptibility type 2 diabetes . Recently , gene involve development type 2 diabetes identify , large part genome-wide association study . Certain risk factor type 2 diabetes , obesity insulin resistance , highly inheritable , diabetic complication diabetes-related eye kidney disorder . However , gene associate link diabetes risk factor complication conclusively identify , research need study specific genetic factor associate aspect diabetes . Objectives : - To identify characterize genetic variant associate type 2 diabetes , risk factor , complication . Eligibility : - Individuals least 18 year age pregnant nursing mother start study . Design : - All participant provide information family history , ethnicity ethnic background , occupation , behavioral risk factor , data request researcher . - In addition general health history , participant provide specific information diabetes history , particular emphasis date diagnosis , symptom , initiation insulin therapy , complication , current medication . - Testing procedure different individual without diabetes . Those without diabetes oral glucose tolerance test , diabetes examine diabetic complication . - Other test study include follow : - Physical examination measurement height weight , waist circumference , blood pressure , test individual diagnose diabetes - Glucose tolerance test classify diabetes - Retinal photograph - Electrocardiograms - Hepatic Ultrasound - Blood urine test - Depending result examination laboratory finding , participant may ask return clinic supplemental interview , physical examination , blood test , arrange referral medical evaluation treatment . - Participants diabetes asked return yearly follow-up visit . Participants diabetes initial examination ask return follow-up visit every 2 year .
DOC.brief_title: Molecular Clinical Profile Diabetes Mellitus Its Complications
DOC.detailed_description: Genetic factor play important role diabetes mellitus , risk factor complication , specific genetic determinant remain unidentified . The molecular pathway diabetes-susceptibility gene influence risk diabetes related condition also largely unknown . This project seek identify , quantify effect , genetic determinant type 2 diabetes , risk factor complication multiethnic sample . Diabetes glycemic status assess clinical interview , oral glucose tolerance test glycated hemoglobin . Insulin sensitivity insulin secretion assess index derive oral glucose tolerance test . Other potential risk factor type 2 diabetes ( e.g. , obesity ) complication ( e.g. , retinopathy , nephropathy ) measure . DNA collect analyzed identify genetic variant associate link diabetes trait . Studies gene transcription , protein expression metabolic profiling perform , result pattern analyze relationship diabetes , relate trait variant diabetes susceptibility gene . Individuals study longitudinally determine gene transcription , protein expression metabolic profile predict development diabetes complication . These study help determine molecular pathway genetic variant susceptibility type 2 diabetes complication .
